docstring.long_description:
**Compatibility:**
Compatible with National Instruments devices that utilize NI-DAQmx. Tested on a simulated NI-9236 module.

This block is designed for use with Windows and Linux systems due to NI driver availability. Ensure you have installed the NI-DAQmx runtime from [NI-DAQmx Download Page](https://www.ni.com/en/support/downloads/drivers/download.ni-daq-mx.html).
docstring.short_description: Creates a task with channel(s) to measure strain.

parameters.name: cDAQ_start_channel
parameters.description: The device and channel to read from.

parameters.name: cDAQ_end_channel
parameters.description: To read from only one channel, set this to the same as `cDAQ_start_channel`. To read from multiple channels, set this to the last channel you want to read from.

parameters.name: min_val
parameters.description: Specifies in **units** the minimum value you expect to measure (default is -0.001).

parameters.name: max_val
parameters.description: Specifies in **units** the maximum value you expect to measure (default is 0.001).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: The units to use to return strain measurements (default is "STRAIN").

parameters.name: strain_config
parameters.description: Specifies information about the bridge configuration and measurement (default is "Full Bridge 1").

parameters.name: voltage_excitation_source
parameters.description: Specifies the source of excitation (default is "Internal").

parameters.name: voltage_excitation_value
parameters.description: Specifies in volts the amount of excitation to supply to the bridge (default is 2.5).

parameters.name: gage_factor
parameters.description: Contains information about the strain gage and measurement (default is 2.0).

parameters.name: initial_bridge_voltage
parameters.description: Specifies the initial voltage across the bridge before any strain is applied (default is 0.0).

parameters.name: nominal_gage_resistance
parameters.description: Contains information about the strain gage and measurement (default is 350.0).

parameters.name: poisson_ratio
parameters.description: Contains information about the strain gage and measurement (default is 0.3).

parameters.name: lead_wire_resistance
parameters.description: Specifies the resistance of the lead wires connected to the strain gage (default is 0.0).

returns.description: This block does not return any meaningful data; it is designed for creating a task to measure strain.
